data.text: @DHSCgovuk Here’s a handy link to9 pages of adverse reactions on Page 30. https://t.co/FUT0k4FBr1 #InformedConsent

@HexieHex @GeorgeDr00 @cpenguina @DHSCgovuk Everyone gets information about yellow card. It's handed over in the information at the time. It's actually in print on the information leaflet with every prescription drug. Even if you didn't know, Google report drug side effects.
@HexieHex @GeorgeDr00 @cpenguina @DHSCgovuk Apologies. There are many factors that might influence an adverse event. So you might have an adverse reaction only if a set of circumstances are present.
@HexieHex @GeorgeDr00 @cpenguina @DHSCgovuk But it becomes harder to link it up. For the few thousand that have reported an adverse event, there are millions that have not.
@Tryingmypatient @GeorgeDr00 @cpenguina @DHSCgovuk Deviating. Starting to make less sense.
